document.full_text: novak djokovic showed his killer instinct again on friday by dumping mardy fish in straight sets to secure a spot in the sony ericsson open final against either rafa nadal or roger federer.
document.title: formidable djokovic advances to miami final
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic showed his killer instinct again on friday by dumping mardy fish in straight sets to secure a spot in the sony ericsson open final against either rafa nadal or roger federer.
